review_data.title: Room and Restaurant Service is Sublime
review_data.content: If you have ever experienced bad hospital food... This will simply blow your mind. Taste matters around here. Best products carefully treated and cooked with love, ending up in a stunning composition of different colours, tastes and textures

review_data.title: Over the top
review_data.content: Came there from Australia to visit my auntie. We had an amazing dinner and especially I want to emphasise the attentive service from our waitress Adelina. We're happy to know that our auntie is so well looked after and has an enjoyable recovery.
